description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Demo Durb is a fun and simple vehicular combat game centered around demolition derby. Not only must you destroy your opponent's vehicle, but you must also strike down their driver to prevent their car from re-spawning. The game includes two other game modes tag, and the cooperative zombie mode. Demo Durb can also be played over system-link for a 16 player frenzy.
